testimonials.title: Owner of Papanots Steak
testimonials.body: Assalamualaikum, Nice to meet you. I am Deni HS from Papanots Steak. Alhamdulillah, the Papanots Steak website has been completed by Dedi Indrawan. Honestly, we are very satisfied and happy with the results (it looks more elegant). Especially for us who are new in the Culinary Industry and still a small and medium enterprise (SME), this makes our brand appear more prepared and professional with a website that is linked to our social media, Papanots.id. In addition to being timely, working with Dedi Indrawan (Build Web) was very comfortable in terms of communication, quick response, and excellent service. What we wanted and aimed for in the creation of the website has been met with our expectations, expressed in the form of a website (vision, mission, branding, promotion, and more). We hope that Dedi Indrawan will continue to grow and be beneficial in helping more SMEs like us to develop in the future. We highly recommend using Dedi Indrawan's services. Inshaa Allah, Papanots Steak can collaborate in the future. Success and blessings for your endeavors.

jobDescription: Developing user interfaces with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Optimizing website performance for speed and efficiency
Ensuring cross-browser compatibility and fixing bugs
Implementing new features and functionality as per client requirements
Managing code changes with version control systems like Git
Communicating project requirements, progress, and feedback with clients
Optimizing websites for search engines to improve visibility and ranking

experiences.companyName: PT. Blue Bird Group - Jakarta, Indonesia
jobDescription: Coordinating with the hotel regarding taxi fleet reservation details
Coordinating with drivers about travel details
Creating daily work reports to be reviewed by the next shift colleague

experiences.companyName: PT. Mitra Abadi Jaya Bersama (Carvil) - Jakarta, Indonesia
jobDescription: Managing all store operations and creating team work schedules
Designing marketing strategies and analyzing customer purchasing trends
Regularly conducting internal team discussions to improve sales and team performance
Creating daily work reports to be reviewed by the area supervisor
